action.selector: .dlightboxContainerBody > div[style="color: #5D5D5D; font-size: 18px; margin: 10px 10px 10px 20px; text-align: left;"] + .standardcontent > [type="text/css"] + .articlelb > table
.inner:first-child:last-child > .corners-top:first-child + .topiclist + div[style="padding: 5px 5px 2px 5px; font-size: 1.1em; background-color: #ECF1F3; margin: 0px auto; text-align: center;"]
.mainBodyTable2 > tbody > tr > td[style="vertical-align: top; padding-top: 30px; padding-right: 20px; text-align: right;"]:first-child
.post td[valign="top"] > table[width="100%"][cellspacing="0"][cellpadding="0"][border="0"] > tbody > tr > td > a[target="_blank"] > img
.td1[valign="top"] > div[style="float:left; width: 300px; height: 250px; margin-right: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px; padding:0;"]:first-child
